trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4TOMRA_00594_MAGUTT_000_000<tab>Lali-ho! Welcome to Tomra, friend. If you've any questions to ask, then I'm your dwarf!
TEXT_REGNOR4TOMRA_00594_MAGUTT_000_010<tab>I was a miner once, but my days of swinging a pick came to an end when my back got too old and twisted. Now I'm just enjoying my golden years!
TEXT_REGNOR4TOMRA_00594_MAGUTT_000_011<tab>I sit here, drinking good dwarven ale, and pass the time boasting about whose beard is best. Mine may be old, but it ain't lost none of its bounce!
TEXT_REGNOR4TOMRA_00594_MAGUTT_000_020<tab>This village is home to the Tholl family.

TEXT_REGNOR4TOMRA_00594_MAGUTT_000_021<tab>We mostly make a living from what we dig out of the mines. You'll also see a few hunters and farmers around the place, not to mention our automata─those are the metal helpers what we build to assist with our daily tasks.

TEXT_REGNOR4TOMRA_00594_MAGUTT_000_022<tab>Oh, one word of advice if you're headed east: take care around them Goggs. You can't trust dwarves with wild, wiry beards like that lot! Just the sight of them shifty buggers is enough to make my whiskers curl... <spit>
